pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, October 3, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Tuesday, October 3, 2017:

Ottawa, Ontario

9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the National Indigenous Leaders.

Library Room, Level 1
John G. Diefenbaker Building 
111 Sussex Drive

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
  • Media should arrive no later than 8:15 a.m.
  • Media representatives must register online at http://www.scicsonline.ca (PIN 614296). Accreditation enquiries may be directed to Céline Lecordier (celine.lecordier@scics.ca, 613-293-6457).

9:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the First Ministers and National Indigenous Leaders.

Victoria Hall, Level 1
John G. Diefenbaker Building
111 Sussex Drive

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
  • Media should arrive no later than 9:15 a.m.

11:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the First Ministers’ Meeting.

Victoria Hall, Level 1
John G. Diefenbaker Building
111 Sussex Drive    

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
  • Media should arrive no later than 11 a.m.

4:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the First Ministers’ Meeting closing press conference.

Whitton Hall, Level 2
John G. Diefenbaker Building
111 Sussex Drive

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage for accredited media
  • Media should arrive no later than 4 p.m.
